parsed.title: O menino que virou arma de ódio
parsed.summary: Um misterioso brinquedo de um menino morto atravessa séculos, da manipulação da Igreja medieval até os fóruns digitais de ódio. Descubra como um símbolo de injustiça histórica se transforma em ferramenta de propaganda e violência contemporânea, sem revelar o fim da história.

scenes.narration: Um menino morto, transformado em brinquedo de ódio, ainda assombra o mundo.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a small wooden figurine of a child with hollow eyes on a dusty altar, dim candlelight casting deep shadows
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the figurine, candle flames flickering, dust particles drifting in the light beam
scenes.audioDescription: Soft creaking of wooden floor, distant echo of chanting, low ambient drone

scenes.narration: O selo dourado pisca, mas ninguém entende seu símbolo antigo e proibido.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a wooden box open to reveal a golden seal that flashes briefly, shadows looming around it
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle camera pan left across the wooden box, golden seal shimmering briefly, subtle light pulse
scenes.audioDescription: Quiet metallic tick, faint wind through cracks, low hum

scenes.narration: Um decreto do bispo mandou imprimir a imagem, financiando a caça aos judeus.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a stack of freshly printed incunabula pages with the bishop's seal embossed, ink still wet, shadows loom over the desk
scenes.motionDescription: Slow push-in on the stack of pages, ink drying droplets glistening, candlelight trembling
scenes.audioDescription: Rustle of paper, distant hammer of printing press, muted church bells

scenes.narration: Hoje, a mesma figura circula em fóruns, alimentando ódio digital sem piedade.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a glowing laptop screen showing a distorted illustration of the child, overlaid with hateful symbols, neon cursor blinking
scenes.motionDescription: Subtle zoom into the screen, cursor flickering rapidly, light reflecting on dark desk
scenes.audioDescription: Soft electronic hum, faint keystroke clicks, low tension synth

scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, black void with faint white text "The Gap Files." appearing slowly
scenes.motionDescription: Static shot, text fading in slowly, subtle breath of darkness surrounding it

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM
